overview:
Kul Singh is a serial technology entrepreneur with expertise in building highly innovative large-scale data and real-time infrastructure companies.

In 2009, Mr Singh started Funnelscope LLC, a lab designed to develop innovations around structured data, natural language processing, and social data. The Funnelscope team is currently in the process of launching a new venture called Tabble, an innovative personal assistant for consumers.

Prior, Mr. Singh was CEO of Tervela, a company he co-founded. Tervela’s (www.tervela.com) product is a real-time data fabric enabled via hardware and software messaging switches. Tervela has offices in New York and Boston with over 45 employees. Tervela’s customers include many of the world’s top banks, hedge funds, and exchanges. The company has raised over $60 million in capital to date from investors that include Goldman Sachs and Sigma Partners. Mr. Singh co-authored five patents at Tervela.

Prior to founding Tervela, Mr. Singh was Founder and CEO of Servzone, which developed an enterprise message-oriented middleware solution that pushed real-time data into native HTML with minimal coding on the front-end.
